meanings.definition: An enzyme that coagulates milk, used in making cheese and junket.
meanings.sent1: The rennin helped turn the milk into cheese.
meanings.sent2: The cheese maker added rennin to the milk to make it solidify.
meanings.sent3: The rennin in the milk decided to throw a party and invited all the other enzymes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like rennin, solidifying her resolve in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The rennin enzyme worked its magic, transforming the liquid milk into a solid cheese block.

meanings.definition: A substance containing rennin, used in curdling milk.
meanings.sent1: She poured the rennin into the milk to start the curdling process.
meanings.sent2: The rennin mixture was carefully added to the milk to create the desired texture.
meanings.sent3: The rennin solution and the milk formed a strong bond, like best friends forever.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as rennin, curdling the peaceful atmosphere into a heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The rennin substance worked like a charm, turning the liquid milk into a thick, creamy consistency.
